3.question: Display the matched elements by fading(затухание) them to opaque(непрозрачный).

4.question: Hide the matched elements by fading(затухание) them to transparent(прозрачный).

5.question: Adjust(управлять) the opacity of the matched elements.

6.question: Display or hide the matched elements by animating their opacity(непрозрачность).

7.question: Display the matched elements with a sliding motion(скользящее движение).

8.question: Display or hide the matched elements with a sliding motion(скользящее движение).

9.question: Hide the matched elements with a sliding motion(скользящее движение).
